survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction with AI-powered chatbots in customer support contexts, identifying strengths and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered chatbots for customer support?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered chatbots for customer support?

questions.question_text: Which of the following industries do you primarily interact with AI chatbots in? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Add a text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following industries do you primarily interact with AI chatbots in? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of responses provided by AI chatbots? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with radio buttons. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Display scale labels in the UI.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of responses provided by AI chatbots? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use AI chatbots instead of human customer support?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons. Options should cover the full range of frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you need to escalate your query to a human agent after interacting with an AI chatbot?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: Which of the following features would most improve your experience with AI chatbots? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 options. Include an 'Other' field for additional suggestions.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with a max selection of 3. Add a text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following features would most improve your experience with AI chatbots? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What is your biggest frustration when using AI chatbots?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT). Use a multi-line text input.

script.question_text: What is your biggest frustration when using AI chatbots?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend AI chatbots to others for customer support? (0 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a numeric scale with radio buttons. Label the endpoints clearly (0 and 10).
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Display the scale endpoints in the UI.

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to participate in a follow-up interview to share more detailed feedback?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question. Ensure the selection is clear.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to participate in a follow-up interview to share more detailed feedback?

questions.client_notes: Use an email input field to validate the format. Clearly state this is optional.
